mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb (id, pwd, name, gender, birth1, birth2, birth3, email1, email2, tel1, tel2, tel3) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth1}, #{birth2}, #{birth3}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_tb WHERE id = #{id} AND pwd = #{pwd}
